text:
Jon Dennis Fox (April 22, 1947 – February 11, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Abington Township, Pennsylvania. He was a member of the Republican Party. Fox served in the United States House of Representatives representing Pennsylvania's 13th congressional district from 1995 through 1999.
Fox died on February 11, 2018 of complications from liver cancer in Abington Township at age 70.
